Plots a network

draw_network.Rd

Plots a network

draw_network(adj_matrix, title = "", size = 4, curv = 0, width = 1,
  shade = FALSE, filter_deg = FALSE, btw_rank = 2, layout = NULL,
  nodes_label = NULL, nodes_size = c(2, 5), pal_edges = NULL,
  pal_nodes = NULL, groupes = NULL)

Arguments

adj_matrix

graph adjacency matrix
title

graph title
size

size of nodes
curv

edges curvature
width

maximum width for the edges
shade

if TRUE, shades the edges unlinked to nodes with high betweenness
filter_deg

selects nodes with a higher degree than filter_deg
btw_rank

betweenness rank +1 of highlighted nodes. If set to 1, none are highlighted.
layout

optional ggraph layout.
nodes_label

optional labels for nodes.
nodes_size

size of nodes, possibility to specify a size per group
pal_edges

optional palette for edges
pal_nodes

optional palette for nodes
groupes

optional vector seperating the nodes into groupes

Value

  • G the network as a ggplot2 object, with highlighted high betweenness nodes

  • graph_data data needed for plotting the network

Examples

adj_matrix= SimCluster(20,2,0.4, 10)
draw_network(adj_matrix,"Cluster graph", layout="fr", shade=TRUE)

#> $G
#> 
#> $graph_data
#> # A tbl_graph: 20 nodes and 72 edges
#> #
#> # An undirected simple graph with 1 component
#> #
#> # Node Data: 20 x 8 (active)
#>      btw bool_btw bool_deg   deg title          name label finalcolor
#>    <dbl> <lgl>    <lgl>    <dbl> <chr>         <int> <chr> <lgl>     
#> 1  1.04  FALSE    TRUE         9 Cluster graph     1 ""    FALSE     
#> 2 12.0   FALSE    TRUE         6 Cluster graph     2 ""    FALSE     
#> 3 20.4   FALSE    TRUE         7 Cluster graph     3 ""    FALSE     
#> 4  0.667 FALSE    TRUE         4 Cluster graph     4 ""    FALSE     
#> 5  0.167 FALSE    TRUE         4 Cluster graph     5 ""    FALSE     
#> 6 22.1   FALSE    TRUE        10 Cluster graph     6 ""    FALSE     
#> # … with 14 more rows
#> #
#> # Edge Data: 72 x 6
#>    from    to weight btw.weights neibs title        
#>   <int> <int>  <dbl>       <dbl> <lgl> <chr>        
#> 1     1     6      1       0.693 FALSE Cluster graph
#> 2     1     9      1       0.693 FALSE Cluster graph
#> 3     1    11      1       0.693 FALSE Cluster graph
#> # … with 69 more rows
#>
